cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)), co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0)))))

comment: The exponential function in terms of sine and cosine. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2006.)
